title: Head from a Composite Statue
description:
Yellow quartzite head probably of Smenhkare. Apparently from a composite statue. Originally fitted with separate headdress.
Condition: Poor. Workmanship of the finest quality. The entire surface extensively chipped. Inlay of eyes and eyebrows missing. Nose missing. Extensive traces of red paint on lips.
credit_line: Gift of the Egypt Exploration Society

museum_location.name: Amarna Period, Martha A. and Robert S. Rubin Gallery, 3rd Floor

If you have any information regarding this work and rights to it, please contact copyright@brooklynmuseum.org.

completeness.name: Good
completeness.description: Most data is approved, but records have not been fully vetted. Many objects have quality photos and descriptions.
